posologyr 0.0.0.9000

Reference

Estimation functions

Functions for estimating the pharmacokinetic parameters

poso_estim_map()

Estimate the Maximum A Posteriori individual parameters

poso_estim_mcmc()

Estimate the posterior distribution of individual parameters

poso_simu_pop()

Estimate the prior distribution of population parameters

Dose optimisation functions

poso_dose_auc()

Estimate the optimal dose for a selected target area under the time-concentration curve (AUC)

poso_dose_ctime()

Estimate the optimal dose for a selected target concentration at a selected time point

poso_time_cmin()

Predict time to a selected trough concentration

Creation of a posologyr list

posologyr()

Creates a posologyr list from a prior model and an individual event record

Error models

Functions for user-defined posologyr models

error_model_comb1()

Residual error model combined 1

error_model_comb2()

Residual error model combined 2

Built-in models

Fictional models built-in for examples

mod_amoxicillin_oral_1cpt_fictional

Fictional oral amoxicillin model for test purpose

mod_tobramycin_2cpt_fictional

Fictional IV tobramycin model for test purpose
